Question: Between 2005 and 2007, this person expressed interest in running for the 2008 Republican presidential nomination.
Hints: On May 11, 2011, this person officially announced his intention to seek the GOP nomination in 2012.
This surprise victory allowed this person to reemerge as the frontrunner once again heading into Florida.
On Super Tuesday **** won his home state, Georgia, which has the most delegates, in "an otherwise dismal night for him".
